revised_title: On the Relation between the Coefficient of the Thomson Effect and Certain Other Physical Properties of Metals
tldr: The author investigates the relationship between the coefficient of the Thomson effect and specific heat, specific resistance, and coefficient of expansion in various metals. The study reveals a close correlation between these properties and the Thomson effect, suggesting that the direction and magnitude of the effect depend mainly on the specific heat, specific resistance, and coefficient of expansion of the metal.
